case.state: Oh? Giving us something to see before we even play? Hehe, you're too kind.
~Player~'s definitely here to show her boobs to the world! She's already doing it!
Hehehe, hey ~player~. Try not to look down for a little while.
Doesn't showing up naked to a strip poker game defeat the point?
Happy birthday to me!
Yoo-hoo! The Kyouko has arrived!
Never fear, Super Sexy Commando Kyouko is here!
Strip poker? Deal me in!
Hey, it's ~player~ again!
~Player~'s back! Ready for more?
Yo, ~player~! Back for another game, I see!
I've come for your boobs.
If the background permits, I wear short sleeves from May to September and long sleeves otherwise.
Set the long sleeve marker to 0 so the case below can play again (allowing the uniform to go back to summer).
I'm seeing double! Six Kyokos!
I'm seeing double! Six Kyoukos!
You got me. I'm always down to see some kitty titties.
We're playing what!? I thought this was just a stripping contest!
People come here not knowing that? What are they here for?
Just the three of us, huh? I'm cool with a smaller table this time.
Just us three? Okay, ~player~, just remember that I'll have to look at you even closer.
Time for some sexy card games!
Oh yeah, it's poker time.
Alright! Let's get started.
Okay, we're all here! Let's get going already!
Alright, a full table! Let's go!
If I was changed to a costume, unset the winter marker just to make sure it's correct.
I'm good.
I'll keep 'em.
This is fine, thanks.
None!
Gimme all your cards!
All your cards are belong to us.
All five!
I'll trade 'em all, thanks.
~Cards.text~!
Gimme ~cards.text~!
~Cards.text~, please.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ for Kyouko!
Kyuppi!
Just in case the punchline never actually plays.
{rainbow}You ever get a hand so good, you just have to break out the rainbow speech bubbles?
Right off the bat? That's awful!
Well, that's no good.
No way!
Well, I thought the point was to get undressed.
Yes! Just as planned!
Perfect swap!
Oh, that's good.
Yeah, I think I'm good for now.
Pure skill!
You wish you had as much raw skill as I do!
Hehe, am I cool or what?
I've got an ideaâ€”let's add some extra rules! How about high-tension strip poker?
Playing just to not lose is boring. You've got to play to win!
Well, if the game's just gonna hand me the win...
Hehe...
I can see you squinting at my nipples under my hair, ~player~. No, that's okay, keep staring.
Does anyone else have a sudden urge to play Namo Bros.?
It's better than nothing.
This is fine.
I have absolutely nothing to say about my cards!
Average!?
Hurry up and draw! Let's see our hands already!
(My manuscript for Comuket is done, right? Meh, I'm sure I've done enough for now)

(Come to think of it, should I be working on my doujin tonight instead of playing strip poker?)
(...Nah, it'll get done.)
Wouldn't it be crazy if all anyone had was junk?
Yawn.
Maybe I'm up again, maybe I'm not. Maybe I'm just trying to mess with your heads.
Even if this hand isn't that interesting, it'll make the results more exciting!
What the heck is this!?
We've been playing for a while, huh? I should've eaten before I came here.
It's a good thing we don't need poker faces for this, 'cause mine is pretty bad.
Random BS, go!
Starting strong, I see!
Guess I'll die.
That's... a hand.
It's all about blowing a few hands to keep your opponents guessing!
Am I reading these right!?
Pro strats! Pro strats!
Anyone know some other strip games we can play? Poker's cool and all, but how about Jenga, or baseball or something?
Imagine how much more fun this game could be if we threw in some items! What do you mean, chucking turtles at each other wouldn't do anything?
We always ask ourselves, "Where are the good cards?" but never "How are the good cards?" Maybe they're on break today.

No! What!? I thought what we had was special!
...I was echoing the how the cards felt when I discarded them.
I don't mind getting weak hands every once in a while. That's the part that makes this game exciting!
Oh well.
Darn, that didn't work.
Wouldn't it be terrible if I tried to distract you guys from the game? That'd be just awful!
I think it's time to break out some sexy poses! Yo, ~player~, how's this?
Hehe, try not to let me distract you too much!
How could you possibly focus on your cards with a sexy beast like me pulling poses for you?
Pow! Is this sexy or what?
Yooo, no one has any clothes left!
This is how sexy poker was meant to be played.
Sudden death! GO!
Come on, that's cheating, isn't it? That's totally cheating!

That looks like fun! Let me try!
But what would Yui say here?
"Don't steal other people's gimmicks."
...Dang, Yui, okay.
Is that thing on your head supposed to help you find treasure? Well, you're in luck 'cause you're looking at her!
I don't know what this gimmick is, but it's gotta be something good if you need to throw for it!
(...Hungry.)
I should have brought something to eat, too.
By the way, how do I look without my ribbon? Wrong? Cursed even? Can you even still recognize me?
Since we're getting naked anyway, how about we hop into the water after the game?
You guys wanna go for a little nakey swimmy after the game? That would be a good way to cool down a little.
Wait, I just remembered that time here is super weird! Today's my 21st birthday, right? Or have I already turned back to 20!?

Come to think of it, the club hasn't met in a while. Oh, I mean the Amusement Club I run. We're not really a club, more like some friends who stole the tea club's abandoned room back in middle school.
It's nice having a place to hang out like this. My friends and I used the tea club's stolen room all the time in middle school, but we've had to just go to each other's places since then.
Hanging around in here really takes me back! I mean, I've got an old uniform and everything!
Hard to see, isn't it? Try not to get scared if someone messes with you in the dark.
(Wonder why nobody's in any of the booths. Why didn't we take that one right there?)
Doesn't this place just make you want to play some poker?
Well, you got me. Way to go.
Wait, I actually lost that? Geez, you guys are tough!
Wait, that hand was good!
Well, if I'm gonna get the worst hand in the game, I might as well just get naked now!
Clearly I'm screwed either way if I'm gonna get the worst hand possible.
That's rough.
That's two in a row. Oh well, it happens.
Hey, wasn't it my turn last time? That wasn't enough?
Hitting me with three losses in a row? How rude.
Maybe I should play a bit more seriously... Nah.
How many am I gonna lose!?
How unlucky can you get?
Not me losing almost everything I have in one go.
...Okay.
Hmm, what to strip first...
You don't think my dress is cute enough to keep? Fine, I'll take it off for you.
Oh no, not the sexy tomato underwear! What could I do without that!?
It's about time, isn't it?
It's about time! Breaking away is boring, anyway.
Nothing like a good, close game to keep you on your toes!
It's really evening out now! Being on the brink of defeat, barely clawing to victory... that's the way to play!
What do you think of this uniform? Pretty unique, right?
Oh no, more stripping!
How could I possibly have seen this coming?
Gee, I wonder what my next move will be. Couldn't possibly be the ribbon, so...
Are you all teaming up on me, or what? How could you do this to poor cute Kyouko?
I'm losing the poker part, but I think I'm winning at stripping, don't you?
You're a tough crowd to please! Well, nothing for it but to keep trying!
I'd feel bad about mercilessly separating this uniform so soon, but it happens.
Guess the first thing I should do is take my shoes off, huh?
This was my uniform way back in middle school. I like to wear this out sometimes just to mess with people.
Off with this thing!
Goodbye, big dress.
Watch out, 'cause I don't think you're ready for what's coming.
I guess you could already see it, but you're still not ready for what's next.
Guess I'll just have to trade the tomatoes for the boobs!
I'll just have to sacrifice this guy to the boob gods, huh?
Well, here goes. The end of the super cool tomato underwear.
As awesome as the tomato panties are, don't mourn for them too much. Their time's up, now's the time for naked poker!
Hehehe, but you actually haven't! That's right, the ribbon's coming off anyway!
Uh-huh. Go on.
Oh no, I chose to let you see my tank top and panties instead of take off my ribbon! The horror!
Like I said, the ribbon stays on during sex. I don't mind going down a little quicker for it.

You know, I might have lost once already, but I have been told I'm pretty good at this game.
...Which part? That's a secret.
Yeah, I could take my ribbon off. But that's boring, and why would I take off something so special to me?
Oh, and if you're wondering about the ribbon, it's staying. I couldn't bear to get rid of it.
Just look at this pattern! Isn't it the cutest?
Isn't this just the sexiest underwear you've ever seen? I'm sure you're in awe of my fashion sense.
What do you think? Worth losing the awesome tomato undies or what?
Something tells me you thought the sacrifice was worth it, though.
Here's where the real excitement is! One hand could spell the end now.
There you go, nothing else to take off. Exciting, isn't it?
Yeah, my ribbon's not so special after all. I've got lots 'cause I lose them all the time.
Not that it matters anymore, since I won't be wearing it for long.
With the uniform gone, we have to switch to always using the base "summer" image.
~Name~'s turn! Make it count!
There is no joke. Take off your clothes.
I don't get your strategy, but I'm sure it'll work soon enough!
Don't freak out now, we're just getting started!
Let's go, more clothes off of ~name~!
Don't you wanna take something off for your idol Kyouko?
Don't be too careful, I've heard you'll get thrown out if you undress too slowly.
Tough hand. Well, don't let it get you down, ~name~!
I'm sure ~name~'s got something really exciting to show us now! ...You do, right?
Don't worry about it, you'll get plenty of chances to show us who's boss later!
Everyone's looking at you! Try not to disappoint us!
Keep it up, ~name~! The game's just getting good!
Hey, ~name~. I hear the cards will be on your side if you take off something good for us.
Ehehe, skill is overrated anyway.
Take off something big? Pretty please?
I think you know what to do by now.
Oooh? What's ~name~ got for meee?
Your turn, ~name~! Show us how it's done!
Okay, you've got the stage! Take the chance to tell us your best joke while you strip!
Now's your chance to show us something cool!
A tie! How lucky are we?

Double strip!
...What, no? That's so boring!
We're so in sync, we have a tie for the lowest hand! How awesome is that?
You're sure you don't want to go with something flashier?
It hasn't been long yet. Might as well get the small stuff out of the way, right?
Taking your time? Oh well, suit yourself.
Couldn't you take off a bit more? I'm starting to get a bit chilly here.
I'm keeping my ribbon to the very end! Can't you keep your ~clothing~, too?
Come on, can't you take off a bit more yet?
I have nothing left to lose and you're only giving ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ up!?
Just that? What am I here for again?
That isn't helping.
No way I'm that bad at this!
Don't fall too far behind! This game goes by pretty fast.
What's the fun in getting straight to important stuff if you don't build up first, right?
You'll strip more when your time comes.
Fine then. Don't share the pain with me.
It's okay, you'll run out of accessories soon enough.
I hope you're having fun, at least.
You're sure showing me.
...Let's keep going.
Don't mind me, I'll just be looking over there.
Eh, what can you do?
Slow and steady, right? Where's the fun if you don't build up first?
Every bit counts. You'll make it count, won't you?
Just your ~clothing~? It's fine, no doubt you'll really wow us later!
You can't keep your real clothes forever!
I've got enough sexy energy to share and you don't want any of it? If you say so.
I'm this close to losing and you're only taking off your ~clothing~? Come on, do something bigger!
I'm getting destroyed here!
Uh, sure, your ~clothing~.
You're just gonna leave me like this?
Draw some interest, then go all out! That's how it's done!
But you have to keep yourself decent first, right?
You're safe for now...
...I'm sure you've got some tricks up your sleeve or something.
Wow, I almost forgot we were playing strip poker.
Must be tough, avoiding the urge to strip when you're playing strip poker.
Maybe later, then.
Fine, I'll keep everyone busy for you.
I'll take whatever I can get.
Boooo.
Alright, you're starting to lose now!
Try not to get too far behind, ~name~! Or don't, either's good.
Take it off! Take it off!
Make it count, ~name~!
Well, if that's how you want to play...
You're gonna take off your ~clothing~ and then some, right? Right?
The floor wants us to dress it up! Don't make it wait!
I'm this far along and you've still got your ~clothing~?
Whaaat? No way you're still only doing your ~clothing~.
Is that really the best you could do?
(He's still going slow? Maybe I should step it up a notch.)
I, uh, admire your commitment.
And the ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(come|comes)~ off!
Good stuff!
This is an acceptable trade.
Every piece makes it even more exciting!
I didn't break out the cute tomato undies for you to just take off your ~clothing~ like that!
That's all, right? Right?
Nothing for it but to keep playing. Come on, next hand!
(What have I been doing this whole game?)
You're sure you don't want to take off a bit more?
I can't be too upset since I win one way or another.
We won't need your ~clothing~ where we're going!
~Name~'s getting on it!
Watch out, guys, the ~clothing~~clothing.ifPlural( are|'s)~ coming off!
Valid, if a bit boring.
Surely you can do better than that!
Wouldn't it have been fun if you'd kept your ~clothing~ on all game?
Oh, you still have your... ~clothing~.
No way you're taking off just your ~clothing~ now!
Only your ~clothing~? Now?
You don't need to be so harsh! You've got friends right here, don't you?
...How long have we been playing now?
Let's keep going!
Looking good, ~name~!
Is that it? Shocker.
Hope there's more where that came from! Or, wait... no more where that came from?
Do some tricks with your ~clothing~, ~name~!
You gotta do something cool with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~! Make us sit on the edge of our seats to see it!
You're gonna take off something bigger soon, right?
Come on, can't you do a little more than that for us?
Is it because I took off my ribbon? You're mourning the ribbon, aren't you?
...Maybe another time, then?
What's your secret to staying in the game for so long!? There's gotta be a secret, right?
~Name~ sure is making it quick, isn't he?
To think I'm only out a pair of shoes!
Go, go, ~name~! ~clothing.ifPlural(Strip 'em, strip 'em|Strip it, strip it)~, ~name~!
What are you doing next? Come on, show us!
Alright, more from ~name~!
Boobs are out, ~name~! I think its only fair if you show us something good, too!
I like where this is headed!
Only a bit left to go! Hurry up, ~name~!
Will he go all the way?
I'm ready. Are you ready?
Having fun, ~name~? I know I am.
Should I join him? Maybe I should join him next.
That's just what this game needs!
...Yep, I can't complain.
Wouldn't it be great if ~name~ stopped looking at his cards? You should totally do that, ~name~!
Not bad. Can't wait to see you lose a few more!
Looking great already! How about a little more?
Well, I was hoping for a bit more, but that's good, too.
...Is it too late to ask for more?
No, dude! You can't just stop there!
Well, I'm already done here, but that's pretty good still.
Your ~clothing~ already!? Geez, I haven't even taken off my shoes yet!
I like the way you think!
Guess you're a lot better than stripping than poker, aren't you?
Alright, ~name~'s getting naked, too!
Who needs ~clothing.ifPlural(|a )~ ~clothing~ anyway?
Your underwear is crying out to see the world! Give it the chance it deserves!
I'm already naked, don't you wanna be, too?
Is it time for ~name~ to get naked yet?
You know you wanna join in on the fun, ~name~.
Haven't I waited long enough yet? Take it off already!
Look at ~name~ getting crazy with her clothes!
Way to set the pace, ~name~!
You know what, I'd almost want to join you!
You look pretty good, ~name~. Maybe even better than before.
Your undies thank you.
Starting to get excited yet?
I'm not staring, you're staring.
...Fine, maybe later.
Oookay...
...Suit yourself.
I can't believe you still had your ~clothing~! What's your secret?
No way he's going for his ~clothing~ already!
Yes! Show us that chest!
You know I'm ready for this.
In comes a ~clothing~less ~name~!
I'm right here behind you, ~name~!
~Clothing~ away!
All it took was going topless myself. Easiest trade ever.
Hmmmm?
Just your chest isn't enough! Take it all off already!
Now you're speaking my language!
Make it worth our while if you've waited this long to show us your chest!
I'll happily look at your chest from now on!
You just wanted to show off, didn't you? I won't complain.
You certainly didn't make us wait for it.
I like your style.
It's not boobs, but it's close enough for me!
Yep, totally worth the wait.
Nice, ~name~.
You're sure you don't want to take off some more?
Boobs are great and all, but guys' chests hit different, too, you know?
You've already blown through most of your clothes this fast, so might as well make this one quick, too.
Well, you didn't make us wait long!
Just whip it out! It's that easy.
Hehe, don't make us wait for too long!
You've got this, ~name~! Just rip ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ right off!
This is it for your ~clothing~! You'd better make it count!
Oh? Is someone else finally revealing himself?
Perfect timing, ~name~! Get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ off, quick!
Take your time. It's not like I'm naked, too, or anything.
I knew I wouldn't get naked for nothing!
Come and join us on the fun side of the table!
Nice, ~name~'s finally getting naked, too!
You're a bit late, but it's better than nothing!
Hey, if you're good with boobs my size, I think can do just fine with dicks of your size.
It's not much, but I get the feeling you'll do just fine.
So little to show us, but you came here to play strip poker with us anyway. Confidence!
Size isn't everything, but...
Kind of cute, in its own way.
Whaaat? Couldn't you have brought a bigger dong for meee?
Nothing wrong with being on the smaller side! I should know.
I can't be too harsh. It's not like I have mega milkers, either.
That looks pretty good to me. Size won't make a difference soon enough.
You know, people say if you massage your boobs, they might get bigger. Maybe that'll work for your dick, too, if you wanna try it.
Ehehe...
Oh yeah, I needed that.
You're making this too easy...
Looks nice, ~name~.

{big}PENIS!{!reset}
What a fun word to say out loud.
Can't go wrong with a happy medium!
Well, ~name~, I like what I see so far!
Not huge, not tiny. It almost stands out for its medium-ness.
I'm jealous that you guys can do fun stuff like spinning your junk in circles! Or at least, I've heard you can do that.
That's what I've been hanging out here for! Hehe, hanging.
That's a pretty good view, ~name~.
No complaints here.
Did you like the show? Hehe, it's okay, you don't need to answer that.
Dude... the way that thing just swings around when you move...
...It's almost like it has a mind of its own.
I almost can't look away! That was your plan this whole time, wasn't it?
It looked big just through your ~clothing~!

You didn't just come here to show off your massive schlong, did you!?
...Did you?
You were really packing, huh?
You totally could whip that thing out! It's practically a weapon!
You've definitely got one of the dicks of all time.
Crazy how there are people like you... and then others like me.
Putting the "long" in "schlong," I see.
Huuuge...
Here come the boobs!
~Name~'s finally taking off her ~clothing~?
Let 'em out, ~name~!
Guess I shouldn't play so hard if ~player~'s already so far along.
This game's about to get a whole lot better!
I was starting to think you'd never show off your boobs!
Finally catching up with me?
Now ~name~'s in my company.
More boobs? Hehe, yes please!
Well, they say the second best time is now.
You couldn't have taken ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off a little earlier?
Welcome to the club, ~name~!
Just couldn't wait to catch up with me, huh?
Boobies?
Looks like we both brought our membership cards for the itty-bitty titty committee!
Actually... it's never too late for cute boobs like yours!
Wait, I'm saying that like it's ever a bad time for boobs.
They say smaller boobs let you get closer to a girl's heart. We could get pretty close, then, if you know what I mean.
Small or not, I could still play with those all day. And then you could do the same to me.
It's almost a crime not to let a cute pair of boobs like yours out!
Small boobs are the cutest anyway, don't you think?
Having fun yet? I sure am.
Don't worry, you don't need gigantic boobs to get me to stare at you!
An excellent pair of boobs indeed.
That's your best outfit yet!
Nothing wrong with being on the smaller side. If anything you're better that way!
You sure didn't disappoint!
...Yeah, it was worth the wait.
...On second thought, this is like a second reward for playing!
The boobs.
Hehe, your ~clothing~ wasn't sacrificed in vain!
Nice and soft... so taâ€”uh, yeah.
The boobs are out whether the world's ready for them or not!
Barely even making us work for boobs like those? You're too kind!
They look amazing, ~name~...
...Thanks, you're a lifesaver.
Can I squeeze them? Please?
...Your boobs look so nice, ~name~.
Those look like fun to play with. Mine can be, too, but I don't have as much to work with.
You could ruin someone's Christmas with breasts like those!
And so ~name~'s boobs were finally released from their prison!
Huge! And so are your boobs!
They're everything I hoped for and more!
We're eating good tonight!
Do your boobs make it hard for you to exercise? My friend Himawari struggles with that, and Sakurako thinks her boobs are why.
Your boobs look so soft... I could play with them all day.
Do you feel a bit tired all of a sudden? I just need to rest my head for a bit...
You might win the size contest, but how do you stack up for cuteness?
...Wait, did I just get distracted?
Boob like those are always worth the wait.
Boobies!
It's so much fun to match a set, I don't think I could just not wear a bra.
I'm listening...
I'm already down here, don't keep me waiting!
Someone's excited to get naked.
Don't worry, you'll be in good company soon enough if you just stop losing!
Good thing you don't mind getting naked now, right? So make it quick!
So you did want in on the fun!
I knew you'd get the point eventually.
Now the real fun's starting!
I'm already naked, too, ~name~! It's only fair.
Almost there, ~name~. Hope you're ready to show off!
Time to lose the ~clothing~!
Hehe, don't worry. We're all ready for this.
I could rub ice cream all over you and eat you...
That's what I like to see!
You didn't need your ~clothing~ anyway. It's fun being naked from time to time!
Isn't this exciting? In more ways than one?
Hehe, the nude group's always taking new members!
How does that feel? Surprisingly nice, right?
Stay winning. Or keep losing? Whatever.
Pretty nice. I bet that doesn't feel half bad, either.
...Perfect.
It's not over 'til it's over, ~name~! Your last-minute comeback starts now!
So this is where you start to sweep us, right? No way you're just gonna lose next hand!
You look pretty good like that. Think you could stay that way for a while?
Rum Raisin!
You cook a lot, right? Maybe you could make something for mâ€”uh, us after the game?
We should totally compare styles sometime, ~name~. I'd draw something now if I brought anything.
What do you do with the stuff you make? I mostly author manga for Comuket, but I've got lots of drawings just sitting around, too.
Did you decide to throw back with an old uniform, too? Or did you just come to play lewd games right out of school?
Did you come here right after school or something? Or did you just get nostalgic for your old uniform?
I feel like you're a little too excited about this game, ~name~.
If you're gonna get a picture of me, make sure you get some sexy ones, like this!
Nice one, ~name~.
Ehehe, just kidding. But I got your hopes up, didn't I?
Ding-ding-ding! We have our winner! Give it up for ~winner~!
Hehe, looks like I win!
I didn't lose? How did I get 7 high and not lose?
Wow, no one had anything? That really was anyone's hand!

state.text: Are you whispering to someone? You aren't hiding something important from the rest of us, are you?

case.state: Bust out the strawberries, ~natsuki~!
Whoa, I guess you're just gonna jump straight to the point.

state.text: That makes two of us! Er, yeah, no gloves, but the ribbon.

case.state: That's how it's done! You gotta keep something to make it more interesting!
What, is strip poker not your thing? Well... bye then.

state.text: Aw, nice, Sanny's not wearâ€”wait, no way!

case.state: Nice. I'm keeping my ribbon the whole game, too.
That makes two of us! Well, I don't have gloves, but I'm keeping the ribbon on, too.
So you were gonna take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off. I was hoping you wouldn't.
Okay, fine, you can take your ~clothing~ off...
Awww, ~clothing.ifPlural(do|does)~ your ~clothing~ really have to go? You look sexier with ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ on!
Aw, you didn't have to take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ off yet! It's sexier if you keep something on.
I was wondering when you'd get to your ~clothing~.
You already got the big stuff off, so I certainly won't complain about you taking off your ~clothing~ now!
Doing the "logical" stuff first is overrated! Getting to the sexy part sooner is way more fun!

state.text: Couldn't you have just kept ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on the whole time?

case.state: What's wrong with just keeping your ~clothing~ on for the rest of the game? It's hardly clothing anyway.
Why bother with your accessories now?
You'll be fine. I won't stare too much.
...Oh, I think I get it now.
...I think we almost match.
Hey, we totally match. Sort of.
Surely you aren't trying to hide panties that cute from us?
You have great taste in underwear.

state.text: That's not something you see every day. Niiice.
I don't know, the strawberry pattern looks pretty sexy if you ask me.

case.state: ...So that's why I couldn't imagine you in your underwear.
Forget about me! You're the real super sexy commando here!
I guess if it lets your game go on a bit longer, it's fine.
You know what, it's better than the alternative, so go ahead.
